front.title: •Perimeter Patrol
front.gametext: Deploy on Bunker. While you control Bunker, each time opponent deploys a vehicle, starship or Rebel to an Endor site (except Rebel Landing Site), that card cannot move or battle for remainder of turn and opponent must lose 1 Force. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Heavy Imperial patrols on Endor forced the Rebels to deploy covertly. The required stealth measures created many complications.

pulledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever & Mobilization Points
combo: Perimeter Patrol + Closed Door + Bad Feeling Have I + Navy Trooper Fensom
